newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM - JUL 2.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM - JUL 2.

text.p: * Romania's President Emil Constantinescu leaves for Bonn today for talks with Chancellor Helmut Kohl to try to sway German support for a "reasonable compromise" on Romania's bid for early NATO membership.
* Parliament's lower Chamber of Deputies voted to adopt a health insurance bill and changes to rules on the organisation of the constitutional court.
